page.title: 02Hafren C.P. School
page.content: Hafren C.P.School is different from every other school in Newtown because it has a Welsh Unit.Most of the children come from English homes.Most pupils transfer to Newtown High School or Llanfair Caereinion.There are 200 pupils in the English Unit & 97 in the Welsh Unit.The Welsh Unit has an Infants Dept..The children in the English Unit attended Ladywell Green Infants School first.15 teachers are employed at Hafren.We have many facilities:-1.Large hall & play area. 2.Small indoor swimming pool.3.Video. 4.3 BBC computers & a disc drive. Every year we compete at Eisteddfodau. Many sport tournaments are held at Hafren.Every Thursday we go swimming at Maldwyn Sports Centre.We have a school orchestra & Interest Periods are on Wednesday afternoons.The Welsh Unit is 20 years old this year.
